backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations for projects with blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to two backend-readiness features with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of summarized descriptions for major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, theme provider, and routes for projects and editor pages inside AuthGate.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that handles identity initialization, enforces login, and triggers profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/features/editor/AudioEditor: Main editor page that loads project data, initializes the audio engine, manages backend readiness states, and renders upload, controls, and editing panels.
frontend/src/features/editor/components/: Panel for tempo analysis and generating AI-style accompaniment, with controls for BPM detection, overrides, and triggering generation.
Handles uploading, validating, and loading audio files into the project, including drag‑and‑drop and backend upload integration.
Provides EQ controls with adjustable frequency bands, enable/disable toggle, and reset functionality tied to the audio engine.
Exports mixed audio or individual stems by rendering buffers offline and downloading them as WAV files.
Mixer interface for adjusting volume, mute, and solo settings for each stem generated or separated.
UI for triggering and monitoring stem separation, displaying progress, errors, and completion status.
UI controls for playback, seeking, and volume using audioEngine state and actions.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useAu: Central audio engine hook managing file loading, playback, stems, EQ, tempo analysis, and accompaniment generation.
Manages play/pause state, time tracking, seeking, and duration for audio playback.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useEq: Provides EQ band state, filter initialization, updates, and reset logic.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useSt: Manages stem list with volume, mute, solo, and generated-stem clearing operations.
Handles async stem separation workflow with progress, error handling, and simulated separation logic.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useTe: Runs tempo estimation on an audio buffer and tracks analysis state and errors.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/accom: Generates synthetic drum, bass, and guitar accompaniment buffers using offline audio synthesis.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/audio: Validates audio file extension, MIME type, and size against allowed constraints.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/downl: Encodes an AudioBuffer as WAV and triggers browser download.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/offli: Offline-renders mixed audio or stems with volume, solo/mute, and EQ applied using OfflineAudioContext.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/tempo: Computes BPM from an AudioBuffer using downsampling, energy envelope analysis, peak detection, and interval mode estimation.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/wavEn: Encodes an AudioBuffer into a 16‑bit PCM WAV Blob by interleaving channels and writing a WAV header.
frontend/src/features/projects/component: Modal dialog for creating new projects, validating input, and submitting via the createProject mutation.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Displays the user's project list, handles backend readiness, and provides UI for creating and opening projects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Determines whether the backend actor is ready and provides a simple readiness state and message.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and projects through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark OKLCH color variables plus base styles for body and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Parses backend errors into user-friendly messages with optional suggested actions and provides a formatting helper.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Describes the project's versioned state, features, issues, and architectural notes for the audio editing app.
